name: get_patient_info
description: Retrieve patient information including demographics, medical history, and current conditions

name: schedule_appointment
description: Schedule a medical appointment for a patient with a healthcare provider

provider_name.description: The name of the healthcare provider (e.g., Dr. Smith, Dr. Johnson)

appointment_date.description: The date for the appointment (e.g., 2024-01-15, next Monday)

appointment_time.description: The time for the appointment (e.g., 2:00 PM, 14:00)

reason.description: The reason for the appointment (e.g., annual checkup, follow-up, consultation)

name: get_medication_info
description: Get detailed information about a medication including usage, dosage, and side effects

medication_name.description: The name of the medication (e.g., Lisinopril, Metformin, Aspirin, Atorvastatin, Levothyroxine)

name: check_drug_interactions
description: Check for potential interactions between multiple medications

medications.description: List of medication names to check for interactions (e.g., ['Lisinopril', 'Metformin', 'Aspirin'])

name: get_lab_results
description: Retrieve laboratory test results for a patient

test_type.description: The type of lab test (e.g., blood work, CBC, metabolic panel, urinalysis). Leave empty to get all recent results.
